posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts.body: Closures are functions that have access to variables from another function’s scope. They are useful for data encapsulation and creating private variables.

posts.title: Getting Started with React
posts.body: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create reusable UI components.

posts.title: CSS Flexbox Guide
posts.body: Flexbox is a CSS layout module that helps in designing flexible and responsive layouts. It simplifies aligning and distributing space among items.

posts.title: Introduction to Node.js
posts.body: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome’s V8 engine. It allows you to run JavaScript on the server-side to build scalable applications.

posts.title: Mastering Async/Await in JavaScript
posts.body: Async/Await is syntactic sugar for handling asynchronous operations in JavaScript, making promises easier to read and manage.
